Text:
Thanks for the share Nikita200.
I have been using Minitool home addition and it's a great program. It will be nice to have these added features, plus the bootable media to do things without Windows running giving you less limitations.

Thanks for all your hard work and time invested.
Norton 360 reports/removes the keygen files as virus.
@CaptPeacock, If you want to run pirated software you need to get use to false positives. Most cracks and most key generators show false positives.

@nikita200
